page.title: 18MY FAVOURITE THINGS.
page.content: I have to dress in style for school,I wear a shirt,shorts and blue socks.If I had my own way I would wear jeans and a denim jacket.At weekends I like to wear jeans,a T-shirt and trainers. The games I play are cricket and tennis.I belong to Littleton Tennis club.Tennis is my main interest.I also play the piano for fun and I have brass lessons. My favourite pop group is Kool and the Gang because I like their music.I enjoy watching televison, especially Hunter,The A-Team,and Street Hawk. I enjoy going to fetes,concerts and shows.I like drinking Coca Cola and lemonade and my favourite food is irish stew and spaghetti bolognaise. { {
